descriptionHtml:
[size=3][color=#ff0000][size=5]Important Note:If you downloaded earlier version and having issues of textures missing or mismatch,please download the fixed version,coz clearly I made a silly mistake,if the latest version still fails,please let me know...[/size][/color]
[color=#ff0000][size=5]And Please Delete The Older Version Before You Install Newer Version!!![/size][/color](Thanks JRCosta for his advice~)


First of all,sorry for my English and all the blahblahblah I'm about to say,I'm not from English speaking countries.

A few days ago,I decided to convert my characters to followers in case of my skyrim ruined again,though I'm suck at using CK,however,with the helping hand of my good man JRCosta([url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/jrlcosta/myworkshopfiles/]Here's is his steam workshop[/url]),I finally made it.

[color=#ff0000][size=4]Before you download:[/size][/color]
This is my first mod,I do expect bug or issues though I hope they will not happen,so if you happened to stomp on a bug,tell me in comments and posts,I'll see what can be done.(Clearly I am a rookie and just fixed some horrible mistakes...well...silly me...)
All followers use standalone materials or vanilla materials,since vanilla materials were all locked inside skyrim.esp,those materials will not be included inside the mod pack,as to standalone materials,see credits to learn about them but you won't need to download them.
Oh,one thing I must apologize,some parts of the follower I was intended to use custom materials but end up using vanilla materials,so there might be some useless testing textures I forgot to delete,but it will not influence the mod.

[color=#ff0000]So,may I interest you with my beautiful girls?Oh,wait,just one for now...[/color]All characters and followers I will upload here is from my Skyrim stories,so don't think they will work with you as a team together,some of them are not in good relationship.


[color=#ffff00]Varkia the Shewolf[/color]
[right][color=#ffff00]——"I've known my fate,an axe I am,a heathen,spoke the men,whose souls to oblivion where I damned.[/color]"[/right]
Class:Outlaw Berserker
Characteristic:Aggressive.
Age:[color=#ffff00]"Fuqing ask again?"[/color]
History:Housecarl of late High King Torygg until she and her former supervisor Atlas locked Torygg outside on the wall with Ulfric,and then she locked Atlas on another part of the wall with a dozen of guards.
Relationship:Born and raised in a Nordic scholar family from Windhelm,she became an adventurer when she was a teenager,she has a naive sister(who often travels to Bitchward and has unhealthy vampire fetish) and a horrible ex-boyfriend Atlas.
Like:Atlas(used to),get drunk,chopping anything with an axe,sunbathing,revealing armors.
Dislike:Any type of mer(Planning to make her relationship rank with orcs to -10 next version),mommy's boy,naughty kids,[color=#00ffff]Elenor[/color](When Elenor came out later ,their relationship level with each other will be -100)

[/size]
[size=3][size=3](The one on the right is what you guys get,the one on the left is my character XD.)[/size][img]http://i.imgur.com/XJPOzaJ.png[/img]

She's blonde,she's nord,and she awaits you in Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood(in case you mistake with Sleeping Giant Inn in Windhelm XD...Sorry,bad joke,too much Cinema Sins recently...).She might have the look of a puppy,but she's a wolf inside.
She's a typical nord (berserker) girl you will find in Skyrim who prefers big weapons than sword and shield,she dislikes heavy armor[/size][size=3][size=3]s(Vanilla heavy armors,folks,vanilla!),[/size] because heavy plates slow her down and get in the way of showing off her assets(You know what I mean,in fact,I welcome you guys dress her as slooty as you can,because that's how I design in her character sheet...).



Working In Progress:[color=#cfe2f3]'Deadeye' Drana[/color]
[right][color=#c9daf8]——“Whispers the arrow,sprints in shadow,in tales men told,she knows no sorrow.”[/color][/right]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/YiyUy8r.jpg[/img]
[center][color=#cfe2f3]"Mr.Luciver,please keep professional!"[/color][/center]


No,no custom or standalone armory so far.If you're interested in the armors used in screen shot,They're:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68144/?tab=11&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Ffeedsmod%2F%3Fid%3D68144&pUp=1]Immersive Mashups by bryanwee20
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69631/?]Banded Iron Bikini by nisetanaka
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69803/?]Steel Nord Plate Bikini by nisetanaka(The version in screenshot is 0.9)
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17401/?]Grimoas Scarf and Gugel by Grimoa
[/url]And if you're wondering the blush effect,it's [url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/1724-blush-when-aroused/]A blush mod from Loverslab,you've been warned.
[/url]


Credits:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG female Textures Renewal by Hello Santa
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS hairdos-Renewal by Kalilies
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28946/?]Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture by xs2reality
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7127/?]Ran's HeadMesh Variants (Type B) by RAN46[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu by expired6978[/url](Yes,I don't use ECE...)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D36992%26preview%3D&pUp=1]SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer by Wast1980
[/url]
Bethesda for Skyrim

If you found yours or other's stuff used by me(in file,not in screenshots) but I fail to mention,please tell me so I can add inside credits,my skyrim is so heavy modded that I can not even remember what I've done with it...
Thank you!


[/size]
author: Luciver0316
